history.content: Well, even if Prof. Weaver reduces the workload to the Fall iteration, it's still a really busy class. I took 61C this Fall along with 170 and I found it difficult to give each class as much attention as I could in other semesters (170 and 70 are similar in that they have heavy p-sets and exams). I would maybe recommend dropping Data 100 and taking another elective/breadth since 61C and 70 are both prerequisites to a lot of upper divs. But if you feel confident about this schedule and have gotten good grades in past semesters with 3+ techs, it would probably be doable.

Hi!

I am planning to take CS 61C, 70, Data 100 and R5B next sem. I think 61C may be too much for 70 and that too with Prof. Weaver. But since Prof. Weaver pointed out that he is reducing the no. of projects and making it similar to the Fall iteration. I am in a good position to declare and need a relatively lower grade for 70, but I still want to be able to give time to the material.

Any advice would be really appreciated.

Thanks a lot!
history.subject: Spring 2020 Schedule
